text: Richard Stehlík (born June 22, 1984) is a Slovak former professional ice hockey defenceman. Stehlik was selected by the Nashville Predators in the 3rd round (76th overall) of the 2003 NHL Entry Draft. He would never play in the NHL. Stehlík previously played for HK 36 Skalica, Sherbrooke Beavers, HK Dukla Trenčín, HC Sparta Praha and HC Vítkovice Steel.Profile at HC Kometa Brno official website He retired from playing professional ice hockey in 2020. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:Lewiston Maineiacs players Category:Sherbrooke Castors players Category:Slovak ice hockey defencemen
title: Richard Stehlík
